full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THUGS RJE CHEN PO BCU GCIG ZHAL DPAL MO LUGS KYI DBANG GI BLA MA BRGYUD PA'I GSOL 'DEBS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI BYANG LHA RTZO DGA' LDAN 'OG MIN GLING GI GRA RIGS RAB 'BYAMS PA NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS THUGS RJE CHEN PO BCU GCIG ZHAL DPAL MO LUGS KYI DBANG GI BLA MA BRGYUD PA'I GSOL, 'DEBS SHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGOR SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO'I SBYAR BA'O,)
